languages.text: {n}Воин отмахивается, но на губах его играет довольная улыбка.{/n} "Брось. Я, конечно, мог бы командовать тобой и твоими людьми, да хоть целой планетой!.. Но мне, воителю Всеотца, слишком легко забыть об ограничениях, присущих обычным людям".

{n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин отмахивается, но на губах его играет довольная улыбка.{/n} "Брось. Я, конечно, мог бы командовать тобой и твоими людьми, да хоть целой планетой!.. Но мне, воителю Всеотца, слишком легко забыть об ограничениях, присущих обычным людям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Stop. No doubt I am capable of commanding you and your people — I could run a whole world! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Stop. No doubt I am capable of commanding you and your people — I could run a whole world! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Stop. No doubt I am capable of commanding you and your people — I could run a whole world! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法不以为意，但他的唇边挂着满意的微笑。{/n}“没错，我确实有能力指挥你和你的船员！不过，我是全父的战士，我有时候很容易忘记普通人的能力极限。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法不以为意，但他的唇边挂着满意的微笑。{/n}“快别这样。没错，我确实有能力指挥你和你的船员，我有能力管理整个世界！不过我是全父的战士，我有时候很容易忘记普通人的能力极限。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se opone a la idea con una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n} «Sin duda podría dirigirles a usted y a su gente. Pero, como guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas, me resulta demasiado fácil olvidar las limitaciones de la gente normal».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se opone a la idea con una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n} «Basta. No cabe duda de que podría dirigirles a usted y a su gente. ¡Podría dirigir un planeta entero! Pero como guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas, me resulta demasiado fácil olvidar las limitaciones de la gente normal».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは不服そうだが、唇には満足げな笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「たしかに俺は、お前たちを指揮することができるだろう…だが、全知の父の戦士である俺は、常人の限界をすぐに忘れてしまう」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不服そうだが、唇には満足げな笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「たしかに俺は、お前たちを指揮することができるだろう…だが、全知の父の戦士である俺は、常人の限界をすぐに忘れてしまう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar protestiert, doch ein zufriedenes Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "Es stimmt, dass ich fähig bin, Euch und Euer Volk zu befehligen! Doch als Krieger des Allvaters vergesse ich zu leicht die Grenzen gewöhnlicher Leute."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar protestiert, doch ein zufriedenes Lächeln spielt um seine Lippen.{/n} "Hört auf. Ich bin zweifellos fähig, Euch und Euer Volk zu befehligen — ich könnte eine ganze Welt regieren! Doch als Krieger des Allvaters vergesse ich zu leicht die Grenzen gewöhnlicher Leute."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar fronce les sourcils, mais un sourire satisfait étire ses lèvres.{/n} « Je serais certes capable de vous commander, vous et vos troupes. Mais en tant que guerrier du Père de Tous, j'ai tendance à vite oublier les limites des gens ordinaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar fronce les sourcils, mais un sourire satisfait étire ses lèvres.{/n} « Arrêtez. Je pourrais sans aucun doute vous commander, vous et vos troupes. Après tout, je pourrais diriger un monde tout entier ! Mais en tant que guerrier du Père de Tous, j'ai tendance à vite oublier les limites des gens ordinaires. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar tereddüt etse de memnun bir gülümseme, dudaklarını ele geçiriyor.{/n} "Seni ve yanındakileri komuta edebileceğim doğrudur! Fakat Yücebaba'nın savaşçısı olarak sıradan insanların sınırlarını hemen unutuveriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar demurs, but a satisfied smile plays on his lips.{/n} "It is true that I am capable of commanding you and your people! But as a warrior of the Allfather, it is too easy for me to forget the limits of ordinary people."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar tereddüt etse de memnun bir gülümseme dudaklarını ele geçiriyor.{/n} "Seni ve yanındakileri komuta edebileceğim doğrudur! Fakat Yücebaba'nın savaşçısı olarak sıradan insanların sınırlarını hemen unutuveriyorum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
